Group (2023-present):
SUPERX

Introduction

Yeung is a South Korean trainee under Nature Space.

On April 9, 2023, he was announced as a member of Nature Space's upcoming boy group VI'ENX. He took part in the group pre-release single "On My Way", released on April 16, 2023.

On September 26, 2024, he was revealed as a contestant on JTBC's survival show PROJECT7 starting in October 2024.
